Package controller

Class AddAppointmentController

java.lang.Object
controller.AddAppointmentController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class AddAppointmentController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
FXML Controller class. Controls the Add Appointment screen.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle rb)
      Initializes the controller class.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - The URL parameter.
      rb - The ResourceBundle parameter.

      There is a lambda listener expression on line 130. It is justified because it listens for the mouse click in the customer table. Then it populates the add appointment form with the selected customer's info. It is more efficient to use a lambda for this task.

      There is a lambda expression on line 137. It is justified because it disables Saturdays and Sundays from being selected in the calendar selector. It is more efficient to use a lambda for this task.

    • displayCustName

    • fillMeetingTimes

      public void fillMeetingTimes()
      This method fills the time picker with times during office hours. Office hours are set to 8am-10pm eastern standard time. The minimum time for a meeting is 15 minutes.

    • fillComboBoxContact

    • validateMeetings

      public boolean validateMeetings(ZonedDateTime newStart, ZonedDateTime newEnd) throws SQLException
      Checks to make sure current appointment being set doesn't conflict with customer's other appointments.
      Parameters:
      newEnd - End of appointment time holder.
      newStart - Start of appointment time holder.
      Returns:
      boolean returns true or false depending on if there is a schedule conflict.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • buttonToCancel

      public void buttonToCancel(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      This method handles the appointment cancel button. When the button is clicked nothing will be saved and text fields will be cleared.
      Parameters:
      event - In this case a mouse clicking the cancel button.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • buttonToSaveHandler

      public void buttonToSaveHandler(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws Exception
      This method handles the appointment save button. When the button is clicked it will save the appointment in the SQL database.
      Parameters:
      event - In this case a mouse clicking the save button.
      Throws:
      Exception
